abstract: Top stories in the news on Tuesday.
snippet: Top stories in the news on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: A besieged Congress party suffered a "resounding defeat" in the by-elections whose results were announced on Monday (Indian Express). As many had predicted, the Congress candidate Jai Prakash came in third in the Hisar Lok Sabha election, but the party's loss was exacerbated by defeats in Andhra Pradesh, Maharashtra and Bihar. While the Congress denied a downslide, maintaining that none of the seats were their strongholds, the BJP hailed the victory of its candidates as the "people's verdict against a corrupt Congress government" (The Hindu).

headline.main: Newswallah: In the English-Language Press Tuesday
